page.title: 07PUBLIC TRANSPORT
page.content: Bus services in the study area are provided by {'UNITED'}a subsidiary of the {NATIONAL BUS COMPANY.}Private bus companies operate vehicles under a contract system to transport to and from schools in the area. These operators are {Handley of Middelham} and {Sayers of Bellerby.} The public bus services operate to Richmond (for Darlington), Northallerton, Ripon and Hawes (two routes). There are no bus services on a{Sunday. The bus to Ripon only operates on Thursday which is Market Day and on Saturday. There are extra buses into Leyburn on Friday (Market Day) from Thornton Steward and Coverdale. The passenger rail service was withdrawn in 1959. The nearest railway station is at Northallerton.
